title: Ryan Odom part of UVA  culture shift  into the NIL world
body_text:
Getting your Trinity Audio player ready...
Ryan Odom has adapted while still adhering to an overarching academic mission he appreciates as a former Division III athlete at Hampden-Sydney in the face of a NIL-dominated landscape.
